info.title: User Management API for QiCard
info.description: API for managing users, roles, and permissions

get.description: Returns a list of all audit logs with associated user data

post.description: Login with username and password to get auth token

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's information

post.description: Update the current user's name, username, or password

items.example: The username has already been taken.

get.description: Returns a list of all permissions

post.description: Creates a new permission with the provided name and group

items.example: The name has already been taken.

post.description: Updates a permission with the provided name and/or group

items.example: The name has already been taken.

get.description: Returns a list of all roles with their permissions

post.description: Creates a new role with permissions

items.example: The name has already been taken.

get.description: Returns details for a specific role by ID

post.description: Updates a role and its permissions by ID

get.description: Returns a list of all users with their roles and permissions

post.description: Creates a new user with the provided information

items.example: The username has already been taken.

get.description: Returns details for a specific user by ID

post.description: Updates a user's information by ID

items.example: The username has already been taken.

post.description: Assigns roles to a user by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of user to assign roles to

post.description: Assigns direct permissions to a user by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of user to assign permissions to

user_agent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36
